#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define mod 1000000007
#define len(a) strlen(a)
#define ll long long
#define nl printf("\n")
#define db printf("debug")
#define yes printf("YES\n")
#define no printf("NO\n")
#define pb(a) push_back(a)
#define po(a) pop_back()
#define mp(a,b) make_pair(a,b)
#define set(a,v) memset(a,v,sizeof(a))
#define sz(v) v.size()
#define pcase(i) printf("Case #%d: ",i)
using namespace std;

ll a[1000005];
ll b[1000005];

int main()
{
   ll n=0,k=0,sm=0, pos=0,i=0,j=0;
   cin>>n>>k;

   for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    cin>>a[i];

    for( i=0;i<k;i++)
    {
        sm+=a[i];
    }

    b[pos++]=sm;

    for(ll i=k;i<n;i++)
    {
        sm = sm-a[j++];
        sm += a[i];
        b[pos++]=sm;
    }
     //for(ll i=0;i<pos;i++)
        //cout<<b[i]<<" ";nl

    //pnt();
    ll q;
    cin>>q;
    while(q--)
    {
        ll s=0,x=0,f=0,sm=0,i=0;

        cin>>s>>x;
        for(i=0;i<s;i++)
            sm+= b[i];
        //cout<<sm;nl;
        if(sm==x)
        {
            f=1;
        }
        else
        {

            ll c=0;
            for(i=s;i<pos;i++)
                {
                    sm= sm- b[c++];
                    sm+= b[i];
                   // cout<<sm<<" ";
                    if(sm==x)
                    {
                        f=1;
                        break;
                    }
                }

        }
        if(f==1)
            printf("YES\n");
        else
            printf("NO\n");
    }
}
